modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description and the provided example:

*Extracted text from website*: "We are grateful for the"
- Incorrect HTML: <html prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#">
- Thought: The extracted text is in English, so I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> element and set its value to "en" to indicate that the content is in English.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#">
